Comment: I actually think there was a lot of slight of hand here - per the NYT, the Supreme Court was actually quite vague and didn't really demand the return of the prisoner :-(  When the Supreme Court handed down its ruling in Mr. Abrego Garcia’s case last week, its findings were complicated and rather ambiguous.  The justices endorsed Judge Xinis’s previous order that required the administration to “facilitate” the return of Mr. Abrego Garcia. But they stopped short of actually ordering his return, indicating that even federal courts may not have the authority to require the executive branch to do so.
